titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Mycophenolate Mofetil in bulk form.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment, through December 31, 1993, to mycophenolate mofetil in bulk form.
